p: Thawed pure yeast cultures of Y. lipolytica was added to sterile YM broth at 1% v/v and sub-cultured twice under the aforementioned conditions ( section 2.1) to obtain a cell count of about 7 log CFU/mL. Y. lipolytica cells were obtained via centrifugation at 8000 × g for 10 min at 4 °C. The obtained cells were washed twice with 10% v/v phosphate saline buffer (pH 7.4) and the washed cells were resuspended in the same buffer to obtain the yeast preculture.
